short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically pauses YouTube videos when the tab loses focus and resumes when it gains focus.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: In this extension your YouTube video will automatically pause when you switch tab or minimize Google Chrome and when you came back to your tab then your YouTube video will automatically start.
